pullRequest.title: Document @ActivateRequestContext for command mode
pullRequest.bodyText:
relates to #8758
Basically just documenting you can put @ActivateRequestContext on the run method to get access to rest of Quarkus API's.

nodes.bodyText: As discussed on zulip, this sentence is wrong. @ActivateRequestContext merely activates the request context and makes it possible to use @RequestScoped beans in the command mode.
